title: How can i see my external mouse cursor on the screen after I rotate to landscape?
content:
I use an external bluetooth mouse and keyboard with my phone. After I rotate the phone, mouse cursors becomes invisible. If i am in settings menu for example, I can see that by hovering settings they highlight, but i can't see the mouse cursor anymore. If I rotate back to portrait the mouse cursor comes back.
What can I do to solve this?
